posts.author: Wirtschaftswoche Online
posts.title: Kampfdrohnen-Angebot von Airbus steht Bundeswehr weiter offen: Eigentlich galt der Bundeswehr-Deal mit ...
posts.text:
Kampfdrohnen-Angebot von Airbus steht Bundeswehr weiter offen: Eigentlich galt der Bundeswehr-Deal mit ... 
Eigentlich galt der Bundeswehr-Deal mit Airbus über die Anmietung israelischer Kampfdrohnen als gescheitert. Vom Tisch ist er dennoch nicht, wie aus einem Schreiben des Verteidigungsministeriums nun hervor geht. 
Die Verträge für den gescheiterten Kampfdrohnen-Deal der Bundeswehr bleiben weiterhin unterschriftsreif. Das geht aus einem Schreiben des Verteidigungsministeriums hervor, das der Deutschen Presse-Agentur vorliegt. Demnach könnte die Bundeswehr das umstrittene Geschäft - im Falle einer zeitnahen Zustimmung des Bundestags - weiterhin zu den bereits ausgehandelten Bedingungen abschließen. Der Rüstungskonzern Airbus habe der Verlängerung der Angebotsbindefrist zugestimmt. Eine Bindefrist bezeichnet den Zeitraum, in dem ein Bieter an sein Angebot gebunden ist. 
Dem Schreiben zufolge bleibt das Angebot von Airbus zum gleichen Preis bis ... Den vollständigen Artikel lesen ...

thread.section_title: Prostate Problems. Forum discussing Prostate Problems at Patient | Patient
thread.title: Experiment : Cialis replacing Doxazosin
thread.title_full: Experiment : Cialis replacing Doxazosin | Prostate Problems | Patient

posts.author: jimjames
posts.text:
Hi Hank,
People react differently to the drugs. I don't think reacting well to Doxazosin versus Cialis will be helpful distinguishing a bladder from a prostate problem, keeping in mind that most of us have some combination of both. If you really want to go the nine yards on that, video urodynamics is the gold standard, assuming it's being done by someone who knows what they're doing.
I took Flomax at one point and probably Doxazozin (not sure) but can't remember what dose I took which could be a factor in your case. I did take 5mg Daily Cialis an found it comparable to both, but the marginal results seemed to fade after a month or so. People react differently to different drugs and then there's the dose issue. Not sure if 4mg Doxa is considered a starting dose, medium or high dose.
Jim

thread.title: Love Letters #40
thread.title_full: Love Letters #40

posts.author: Ocean Bream
posts.title: Love Letters #40
posts.text:
Dear Friday,
Am I allowed to write a love letter to a day of the week? Is it the done thing to do? Am I cheating on Tuesday, if I use her generous time to commemorate her competitor?
Oh but Friday, how I look forward to you. I eagerly await your sunrise, I dance through your hours with a spring to my step, even in the dead of winter. You fill me with joy, hope and an anticipation which grows with every hour approaching dusk.
You signify the end of an arduous week, and the blossoming of freedom and a thousand possibilities. You are better than a Saturday or a Sunday, because rest during your hours feels deserved, somehow; earned.
Oh, I love you, Friday. A deep, burgeoning love. A love that breeds of yearning and satisfaction. A love that comes from tenderness and care; a soft lamp on a tired evening, the soft rustle of pages turning in an exciting book, the warm smell of freshly cooked pizza, delivered to the front door.
Friday, you massage my achey feet, you throw my door open for me and the light flooding out is beckoning, full of promise. On other days I walk in stressed, thinking about the work ahead of me, but on your days, you caress me so and my mind empties. My shoulders relax.
I miss you when your last tendrils float away into the deep night, and I long for you before the new week has begun.
You are my new hope, and my old joy.
Yours most faithfully.

thread.title: [委託件002]H大的地下室
thread.title_full: [委託件002]H大的地下室

posts.author: 聖方 (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: [委託件002]H大的地下室
posts.text:
【吉祥清潔公司，專門打掃凶宅，越兇越愛， 
清掃完後，包准比新建的大樓還乾淨。意者請洽0988174748】 

白底黑字，短短兩行，沒任何圖案的宣傳單，出現各公司的郵筒裡，這是郝吉祥用了新買的筆記型電腦，打字完後，跑去便利商店列印，再自己親自去塞的。 

梅天梁議員從助理拿來的那疊信件中，抽出唯一那張沒用信封裝的宣傳單。 

〝叩叩叩〞 

「請進」梅天梁盯著宣傳單發笑， 
「妳在開心什麼？」進來的是議員的好友－Ｈ大的女校長， 
「這個啦！我還以為是哪來的抗議陳情書咧！」梅天梁遞給她， 
女校長接過後稍作閱讀， 
「不過，妳可以聯絡看看」梅天梁開口， 
「什麼？」女校長反應不過來， 
「妳學校不是有一個恐怖的密室？」梅天梁揚眉， 
「地下室啦！密室！」女校長失笑， 
「差不多囉！」梅天梁聳肩， 
「但…上面沒寫如何收費」女校長翻看宣傳單， 
「唉唷！妳就試試看嘛！如果被騙，我幫妳告到該公司倒閉！」梅天梁說， 
「好吧！」女校長拿出手機聯絡。 

◎ 

風評極佳、建築嶄新的Ｈ大，就像其它學校一樣，有著許多眾所皆知，卻不知真假的"聽說"，而這個學期正好流行"地下室怪談"。 

「聽說學生餐廳旁邊的那個地下室，裡面死過人」 
「聽說前任校長就死在地下室」 
「聽說現任校長殺死了前任校長」 
「聽說前任校長是現任校長的老公」 
學生們聚在一起，言之鑿鑿地聊著各自的"聽說"。 

「咦！你不是自願要去掃那裡？」男同學轉向始終沉默的他， 
「哇！不知道你這麼大膽！」女同學調侃， 
「掃那邊有錢領」名叫鍾奎的男生淡淡回應， 
「校長給你多少？」男同學問， 
「三萬」鍾奎答道， 
「這麼多？！」男同學驚呼， 
「你不怕有命賺沒命花嗎？」另一女同學蹙眉， 
未等鍾奎說話， 
女同學繼續講：「你們忘記了嗎？上次隔壁系，人稱白大膽的白祐，打賭輸了所以自己去那個地下室，結果…」。 

「結果呢？」男同學聽得入迷， 
「結果住進精神病院，到現在還沒出院」女同學壓低音量， 
「他是看到什麼？」男同學好奇， 
「一個全身腐爛的男人，碎唸著聽不懂的話，邊講還邊吐黑血」女同學扮鬼臉， 
「哇！」男同學故意大吼， 
「呀啊！！」「好可怕！！」其餘女同學們捂耳尖叫， 
女同學瞇眼：「這樣～你還敢去嗎？」， 
鍾奎嚥了下口水， 
「上課上課！全部坐好！」教授搭配著上課鐘聲，適時走進教室。 

◎ 

一輛靈車停在Ｈ大校門口，車子兩邊側面各貼了‘吉祥清潔公司’字樣。 

郝吉祥開心的提著清掃用具進到校長室。 

女校長毫不掩飾地上下打量對方， 
「校長好」郝吉祥率先打破沉默，她很受不了被這樣看， 
「校長，我來了」鍾奎也走進校長室， 
郝吉祥忽然有點如釋重負， 
「你來得正好，帶這位…」女校長眼神示意， 
郝吉祥自我介紹：「敝姓郝」， 
「呃，隨便，帶她去吧！」女校長擺擺手， 
「校長，您不是說，交給我打掃嗎？」鍾奎抗議， 
「你自己沒辦法！」女校長顯得煩躁不已， 
「等等，還沒說妳要付多少錢」郝吉祥說， 
「妳想收多少？」女校長反問， 
「至少十萬」郝吉祥微笑，   
「妳去搶比較快！」鍾奎脫口而出， 
「欸！我上個委託可是收到十四萬唷！」郝吉祥驕傲道， 
「好，沒問題，只要能順利打掃乾淨」女校長推眼鏡， 
鍾奎不情不願帶著郝吉祥前往學生餐廳。 

「十萬…我才開價三萬…」鍾奎嘟嚷， 
「小弟弟，別把自己當廉價勞工」郝吉祥語帶嘲笑， 
鍾奎還想著怎麼回嘴， 
郝吉祥先邁步：「地下室是從這個樓梯下去吧？」， 
「那個…打掃用具」鍾奎站在原地， 
「拿呀！懷疑啊？」郝吉祥隨便瞥了一眼， 
鍾奎撇下嘴，拎起用所有用具。 

◎ 

整個地下室充斥著壓抑的氛圍，還不時飄來血腥味。 

「喂！」郝吉祥的聲音形成迴音， 
「怎麼了？！」鍾奎被她嚇到， 
「校長在電話裡說，這個地下室之後要改建成貴賓室」郝吉祥說， 
「嗯」鍾奎小心翼翼環視四周， 
「這裡不是學校嗎？建什麼貴賓室？」郝吉祥輕笑， 
「啊啊啊！」鍾奎忽然大叫， 
「你幹嘛？」郝吉祥怒瞪， 
「後、後、後面」鍾奎結巴， 
郝吉祥轉頭，正好和頭破血流的男人對望，她再次回眸：「鬼叫啥？」， 
「妳、妳、妳看不到嗎？」鍾奎差點咬到舌頭，  
「少在那邊裝，想偷懶也要高招點」郝吉祥抽起掃把丟他， 
男人飄到鍾奎身邊繞：「她殺…了…我」邊講邊七孔流黑血， 
郝吉祥將倒掉的桌椅先扶起， 
鍾奎終於理解白祐為什麼會發瘋，因為就連從小能見鬼的他，每次看到鬼，都還是會被嚇個半死，更何況是普通人呢？不過看來，眼前這位兇巴巴的小姐，八字可能特別重，竟然完全看不到這個中年男鬼。 

「又發什麼呆！？別以為你只收三萬就可以擺爛！」郝吉祥把雜物掃成一堆， 
「我幫妳」鍾奎把那堆雜物倒進大的垃圾袋，中年男鬼依舊飄來飄去亂吐血，但有郝吉祥在旁，似乎就沒那麼恐懼了。 

◎ 

幾個小時後，女校長站在樓梯口，滿意地俯視著成果， 
「怎麼樣？」郝吉祥自滿不已， 
「嗯，果然厲害」女校長直接付現金給她， 
「歡迎多多介紹啊！」郝吉祥將十萬收好， 
鍾奎癟著嘴把明顯較薄的三萬放入皮夾。 

已經變得很乾淨的地下室，中年男鬼仍然在嚎叫，血依舊噴得到處都是，但在看不見鬼的人眼裡，該處簡直是煥然一新。 

◎ 

兩人提著打掃用具回到靈車旁， 
「呃…這不是…」鍾奎傻眼， 
「中古靈車，便宜又好用」郝吉祥拍拍車門， 
鍾奎決定不予回應，靈車就算了，還是中古的？！ 
「後座超寬敞的欸！你睡也綽綽有餘唷！」郝吉祥打開後車廂， 
冰冷氣息直衝鍾奎鼻孔，讓他連打好幾個噴嚏， 
「喂，看我們合作得不錯，不如你來當我的助手如何？」郝吉祥提議， 
鍾奎替她將打掃用具放進車裡， 
「我可沒你們校長那麼摳，我一個月付你五萬」郝吉祥比出右手掌， 
鍾奎有點被打動，但要他搭著靈車… 

「包吃住，外加分紅，如何？」郝吉祥再度拋利， 
「這麼好？！」鍾奎睜大眼，他真的非常需要錢， 
「拜託！我可是出了名最善待小弟的吉祥姊！」郝吉祥笑道， 
「嗯，鬼不恐怖，沒錢才恐怖」鍾奎自語， 
「你說什麼？」郝吉祥沒聽清楚， 
「好，我答應」鍾奎露齒而笑， 
「合作愉快，我是郝吉祥，叫我吉祥姊就好」郝吉祥伸出手， 
「我叫做鍾奎」鍾奎與其握手， 
「哈哈哈！鍾馗喔？啊你不就很會抓鬼？」郝吉祥大笑， 
「同一個鍾，但奎是大圭奎」鍾奎有點困窘， 
「喔…好啦好啦！你今晚整理行李，明天就搬來公司」郝吉祥交代。 

靈車揚長而去，鍾奎才回過神，剛剛好像答應了一件不得了的事？

Schwab Charles Investment Management Inc. cut its holdings in shares of Acacia Research Corporation (NASDAQ:ACTG) by 43.4% during the 2nd quarter, according to its most recent disclosure with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The firm owned 93,236 shares of the business services provider’s stock after selling 71,455 shares during the quarter. Schwab Charles Investment Management Inc. owned 0.18% of Acacia Research Corporation worth $383,000 as of its most recent SEC filing. 
Several other institutional investors and hedge funds have also made changes to their positions in ACTG. Wells Fargo & Company MN increased its holdings in shares of Acacia Research Corporation by 42.0% during the first quarter. Wells Fargo & Company MN now owns 49,812 shares of the business services provider’s stock worth $286,000 after purchasing an additional 14,739 shares during the period. Bank of New York Mellon Corp increased its stake in Acacia Research Corporation by 3.8% in the first quarter. Bank of New York Mellon Corp now owns 239,104 shares of the business services provider’s stock valued at $1,375,000 after acquiring an additional 8,773 shares during the last quarter. American International Group Inc. increased its stake in Acacia Research Corporation by 7.1% in the first quarter. American International Group Inc. now owns 30,748 shares of the business services provider’s stock valued at $177,000 after acquiring an additional 2,028 shares during the last quarter. TIAA CREF Investment Management LLC increased its stake in Acacia Research Corporation by 13.7% in the first quarter. Finally, Geode Capital Management LLC increased its stake in Acacia Research Corporation by 5.6% in the first quarter. Geode Capital Management LLC now owns 379,856 shares of the business services provider’s stock valued at $2,184,000 after acquiring an additional 20,257 shares during the last quarter. 72.30% of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors. 
A number of research analysts recently issued reports on the stock. Zacks Investment Research cut shares of Acacia Research Corporation from a “hold” rating to a “sell” rating in a research note on Wednesday, November 1st. Barclays PLC reissued a “sell” rating and issued a $5.00 price objective on shares of Acacia Research Corporation in a research note on Tuesday, October 31st. ValuEngine raised shares of Acacia Research Corporation from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating in a research note on Tuesday, October 31st. TheStreet raised shares of Acacia Research Corporation from a “d” rating to a “c-” rating in a research note on Thursday, October 26th. Finally, Northland Securities set a $8.00 price objective on shares of Acacia Research Corporation and gave the company a “buy” rating in a research note on Monday, July 10th. Two analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating and two have assigned a buy rating to the stock. The company currently has an average rating of “Hold” and a consensus price target of $6.50. 
In related news, Director Frank E. Walsh III bought 25,000 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction on Friday, September 15th. The shares were purchased at an average price of $3.98 per share, for a total transaction of $99,500.00. Following the completion of the transaction, the director now directly owns 383,961 shares of the company’s stock, valued at approximately $1,528,164.78. Also, Director G Louis Graziadio III bought 22,094 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction on Wednesday, August 23rd. Following the transaction, the director now directly owns 502,995 shares of the company’s stock, valued at $1,574,374.35. The disclosure for this purchase can be found here . Insiders purchased 147,250 shares of company stock worth $520,303 over the last three months. 7.67% of the stock is currently owned by insiders. 
Acacia Research Corporation ( NASDAQ ACTG ) opened at $4.45 on Tuesday. The stock has a market cap of $225.16, a P/E ratio of 1.51 and a beta of 1.24. Acacia Research Corporation has a one year low of $2.90 and a one year high of $7.68.

thread.title: Sassoon Dock Art Project comes to Mumbai
thread.title_full: Sassoon Dock Art Project comes to Mumbai

posts.author: FE Online
posts.title: Sassoon Dock Art Project comes to Mumbai
posts.text:
Who suggested demonetisation in India? Niti Aayog CEO Rajiv Kumar reveals name 
St+art India Foundation has announced the launch of the Sassoon Dock Art Project as part of the St+art Mumbai 2017 Urban Art Festival. The Sassoon Dock Art Project is an experiential exhibition which will see the creation of site-specific installations, murals, audiovisual experiences, screenings, talks and curated tours in an unconventional space of one of the busiest docks of Mumbai, nestled at the tip of Colaba. Over the next two months, the 142-year-old space of Sassoon Dock will be transformed into a public art exhibition that will delve deeper into the various layers of the city, and the multilayered contexts of the dock. Sassoon Dock which has remained locked for Mumbaikars so far, will be unlocked and activated with artworks, performances and other active installations. With support from Asian Paints and associations with Mumbai Port Trust (MBPT), Singapore Tourism Board, Bonjour India, Institut Francais and JSW Group amongst a host of other partnerships with cultural institutions and embassies, St+art Mumbai 2017 will bring to Sassoon Dock 30 Indian and international artists between November 11 and December 30. 
The aim is to create a temporary cultural hub and a provide a stimulating experience, open to everyone while working alongside the community of locals and economies that are thriving in the area. 
Giulia Ambrogi, co-founder and festival curator, St+art India Foundation said, “Expanding at a very fast pace the city that never sleeps has spots lost in time. Everyone in Mumbai knows of Sassoon Dock but very few have ever stepped in. The aim of the Sassoon Dock Art Project is to unlock an area which is ready to be discovered, enlightening its narratives through art interventions of international and unique Indian artists. The Sassoon Dock Art Project is an ecosystem of its own to experience in an overall dialogue between the finest contemporary global urban art and the deepest local traditions.” 
Amit Syngle, president – sales, marketing, technology and home improvement, Asian Paints, said, “Like every year, we yet again hope to add a bit of vibrance to the city and uplift the moods, spirits and lives of Mumbaikars. We want to take art to the masses and make it accessible to a wider range of spectators. The idea is to open spaces to dialogues, conversations and culture creation through the lens of the city.” 
Hanif Kureshi, co-founder and creative director, St+art India Foundation, commented, “Sassoon Dock is surrounded by many established art galleries, but most of the local community is not aware of it. Same way people outside the docks have only heard of Sassoon Dock, but not many people have ventured inside. With this project, we invite all Mumbaikars to come and discover the new side of the city and experience art at this unexpected place.” 
There will be special schedules across weekends in November where the exhibition will transform into a pop-up cultural hub for various creative communities to come together. These weekends will see special programming with the Singapore Tourism Board (STB), Institut Francais and Bonjour India. 
With the intent of creative and cultural exchange between India and Singapore, Sassoon Dock Art Project will see the Singapore Weekender with several Singaporean artists in association with Singapore Tourism Board’s new brand ‘Passion Made Possible’. 
G B Srithar, regional director, South Asia Middle East and Africa, Singapore Tourism Board, said, “Singapore is popular as a family friendly destination. We are happy to partner with St+art India Foundation and Impresario Group, both players known to break boundaries in their own fields. Through this collaboration, we seek to present Singapore in a different light to the young adults and working millennial segments who travel for various pursuits. In showcasing Singaporean artistes’ work in line with our brand, we hope to entrench Singapore as an exciting lifestyle hot spot. Many travel interest triggers, like music, art and dining can be satiated in Singapore.” 
“Institut francais India has a long-standing relationship with St+art India Foundation. With Bonjour India it has developed into an even stronger partnership. St+art Urban Art Festival will animate Mumbai, Hyderabad, Kolkata and Chandigarh with social innovation and urban art. Local and international artists will create works on site inspired by local stories and materials. Together these will tell each city their own stories. With murals, graffiti, audio-visual experiences, this tale of two countries will come together in one Indo-French moment,” said Dr Bertrand de Hartingh, director, Institut francais. 
Sanjay Bhatia, chairman, Mumbai Port Trust said, “With its historic legacy, Mumbai Port is pleased to be a part of the art exhibition at Sassoon Dock, which is the oldest dock from where the port has evolved over the past 150 years. The port has been a standing testimony of Mumbai’s evolution and this initiative of wall painting and its exhibition is a step further in this direction. We welcome the artists, both international and Indian in their journey to revamp the Sassoon Dock with their murals and take it to global limelight.” More Top News

thread.title: Aguete repite con España
thread.title_full: Aguete repite con España

posts.author: Faro de Vigo
posts.title: Aguete repite con España
posts.text:
fútbol sala - Primera División Femenina Aguete repite con España La portera del Poio Pescamar ha sido citada por Alicia Morell para el doble enfrentamiento ante Rusia de la semana próxima x.g.g. | poio 07.11.2017 | 03:34 Silvia Aguete, en un calentamiento del Poio. // Rafa Vázquez 
El Poio Pescamar vive en un estado de felicidad permanente. A la buena dinámica que le ha hecho alcanzar la tercera plaza de la clasificación se le unió ayer la llamada de Silvia Aguete con la Selección Española de fútbol sala. 
La seleccionadora, Alicia Morell, ha vuelto a confiar en la cancebera del Poio Pescamar para el doble duelo que le medirá la próxima semana ante el Rusia. Aguete está citada para concentrarse en la localidad ciudarrealeña de Alcázar de San Juan a partir del próximo domingo. 
Silvia convenció a la entrenadora del combinado nacional en su última convocatoria, el pasado octubre. En aquel momento, la seleccionadora decidió volver a contar con la portera del Pescamar después de varias temporadas. 
La portera había debutado en 2013, con 25 años, en el combinado nacional y llegó a ser integrante de la lista del Campeonato del Mundo de Costa Rica de 2014, en el que España quedó tercera y ella pudo disfrutar de muchos minutos en el último encuentro. 
Después de aquello, Silvia se fue alejando del fútbol sala de élite para centrarse en sus estudios, aunque en el penúltimo verano regresó al Poio Pescamar. Un año después, sus grandes actuaciones con el cuadro poiense le devolvieron la confianza de Morell, que la citó para el doble enfrentamiento contra Portugal. Ahora, repetirá ante Rusia. 
Pero Aguete no es la única jugadora dirigida por Marcio Santos que mantiene un idilio con los combinados nacionales. La otra es Carolina Agulla, que el pasado sábado, horas antes de que jugase su equipo, fue parte importante de la Selección Española sub-17 que se clasificó para los Juegos Olímpicos de la Juventud, que se disputarán en Buenos Aires en 2018. 
Ahora, Agulla luchará por mantener su nivel en el Poio y poder acudir a la cita intercontinental con "La Roja". Compartir en Twitter

thread.title: Thailand vehicle sales on the up despite political crisis
thread.title_full: Thailand vehicle sales on the up despite political crisis

posts.author: Jacob Alexander
posts.title: Thailand vehicle sales on the up despite political crisis
posts.text:
Political strife within the Thai government hasn’t slowed down vehicle sales in the Kingdom. In April, General Motors reported a 62% jump in sales to 1,879 vehicles compared to 1,162 units in the same month last year. With this rise in demand, GM is toying with the idea of increasing output at its Rayong factory to 76,000 vehicles per annum and to invest US$467 million to upgrade facilities and build a new diesel engine plant.
The gains are not just for GM, as even Toyota, who recently suspended production at one of its plants , increased deliveries by 43% to 92,000 units. Isuzu, another big pick-up truck player, has reported a 44% jump to 46,071 units sold. These figures are year-to-date, as of end April. According to the Automotive Industry Club, general vehicle output has increased by 129% from a year earlier to 150,119 vehicles.
Ray Young, GM’s vice president of international operations, is concerned about the current political crisis but reiterated his company’s confidence in our northern neighbour. “We are monitoring the situation in Thailand, but we remain optimistic. Our business and expansion plans will continue in Thailand without delays. The nation will remain the leading automotive market in the ASEAN region,” he said.

posts.title: InterXion : Access to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Now... | 4-Traders
posts.text:
AMSTERDAM, THE NETHERLANDS - November 7, 2017 - INTERXION HOLDING NV (NYSE: INXN), a leading provider of carrier and cloud-neutral colocation data centre services in Europe, today announced that access to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure is now available across its European footprint through Cloud Connect , Interxion's cloud interconnection platform. With this offering, Interxion provides enterprises with reliable, low-latency access to Oracle cloud solutions as they build their hybrid and multi-cloud environments. 
'Our recent IDC research ' The Digital Enterprise ' shows that 53% of European businesses currently use or plan to build a hybrid cloud solution,' said Vincent in' t Veld, VP Platforms at Interxion. 'We've created the ideal environment to build and operate such solutions, and now customers can reap all of the benefits of the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, by building predictable and high-performance connections into Oracle's range of cloud services. This includes Oracle's software for enterprise analytics, marketing and resource management, as well as PaaS solutions for app development and beyond.' 
Interxion's Frankfurt facility is now an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure FastConnect location enabling dedicated and private access to Oracle Cloud. Customers colocating their network and private IT environments in any of Interxion's data centres across Europe can now access this service through Cloud Connect. 
'Customers require seamless connectivity from their data centres and networks to Oracle Cloud for their most demanding workloads and applications,' said Don Johnson, Senior Vice President Product Development, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. 'With the FastConnect Service from Interxion in Frankfurt, customers can provision the dedicated and private connections they need today and easily scale with their growing business demands.' 
InterXion Holding NV published this content on 07 November 2017 and is solely responsible for the information contained herein.

thread.title: GM capitalizes on Toyota's recall headache!
thread.title_full: GM capitalizes on Toyota's recall headache!

posts.author: Danny Tan
posts.title: GM capitalizes on Toyota's recall headache!
posts.text:
Toyota’s big rival in North America, General Motors, is seeking to capitalize on the recall issues that is giving its Japanese competitor an almighty headache. Toyota USA recently suspended sales of eight models involved in a recall that aims to fix sticking accelerator pedal mechanisms that could cause unintended acceleration (only applicable in North America).
GM has come up with incentives to entice Toyota and Lexus owners to switch to its cars. The programme, which runs through the end of February, offers Toyota/Lexus owners three options should they opt for a GMC, Buick, Cadillac or Chevrolet vehicle:
– Leasing: Three payments for up to a total of $1,000 waived
– Financing: 0 per cent financing for up to 60 months for qualified customers
– Cash buyers: $1,000 off the purchase price
This move is in response to “thousands” of calls and e-mails to dealers and GM employees from Toyota owners asking for help, GM spokesman Tom Henderson was Quote: d as saying. In other words, GM says that it is merely helping the American public and is not twisting the knife that’s hurting Toyota. The explaination behind this offer is that it will compensate for some of the value Toyota trade-ins would have lost as a result of the recalls. Will other opportunists follow suit?

thread.title: Royal couple visit 4 places of worship in Penang
thread.title_full: Royal couple visit 4 places of worship in Penang

posts.author: Bernama
posts.title: Royal couple visit 4 places of worship in Penang
posts.text:
Twitter 
British royal couple is on a one-day visit to Penang, which was originally named “Prince of Wales Island”, with their first stopover at the St George’s Church, the oldest Anglican church in Southeast Asia which was built in 1818 
GEORGE TOWN: Prince Charles, the Prince of Wales and his wife Camilla, the Duchess of Cornwall, began their maiden visit to Penang by visiting places of worship in George Town, the UNESCO World Heritage site. 
The British royal couple is on a one-day visit to Penang, which was originally named “Prince of Wales Island”, with their first stopover at the St George’s Church, the oldest Anglican church in Southeast Asia which was built in 1818. 
Upon the arrival at the church at 10.05 am, the royal entourage was greeted by St George’s Church, Penang’s Bishop Charles Samuel before they spent 20 minutes admiring the church’s new pipe organ inside the church which was declared a national heritage in 2007. 
Prince Charles and Camilla were also presented with an oil painting in conjunction with the church’s bicentenary celebration before they proceeded to visit the Kapitan Keling Mosque which was only a kilometre away. 
Built in 1801 by Penang’s first Indian Muslim settlers, Kapitan Keling Mosque located at the junction of Lebuh Buckingham and Lebuh Pitt, is one of the largest mosques in Penang Island which was built according to the Indo-Moorish structure. 
Earlier, hundreds of people from all walks of life holding the Malaysian and United Kingdom flags, had gathered along the streets under tight security to catch a glimpse of the British royal couple and some were lucky enough to shake his hand. 
At the mosque, the royal couple was welcomed with a kompang troupe, a traditional Malay musical instrument, before they were greeted by the chairman of the mosque, Datuk Meera Mydin Mastan who later accompanied the British royal visitors to participate in a tree planting event to commemorate their visit here. 
After spending about 15 minutes at the mosque, they then signed the guest book before leaving on foot to the Han Jiang Ancestral Temple, about 100 metres away. 
Han Jiang Ancestral Temple or previously known as Teochew Kongsi located in Chulia Street was built in 1890 by the Teochew migrants from Chaozhou prefecture, on the eastern part of Guangdong province in China. 
The Prince and Duchess spent about 15 minutes enjoying the lion dance troupe, a traditional Chinese cultural dance in the temple before they strolled across the street to visit the Sri Mahamariamman Temple at Queen Street. 
Accompanied by Minister-in-Attendance S K Devamany, who is also Deputy Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department, the royal couple toured the temple. 
Sri Mahamariamman temple is the oldest temple in George Town which was built in 1833 and was extensively renovated in 1933 with a prominent dome and entrance tower. 
The royal couple then proceeded to visit the Seven Terraces, a contiguous row of Anglo-Chinese terrace houses located just behind the Goddess of Mercy Temple at Jalan Masjid Kapitan Keling here. 
The visit of Prince Charles and Camilla to Malaysia is part of a 11-day tour of Their Royal Highnesses to Singapore, Malaysia and India from Oct 30 to Nov 9.

posts.author: Александр Пархоменко (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: ДОКУМЕНТ: Сколько военных из Крыма предали Украину: опубликованы шокирующие цифры
posts.text:
После аннексии Крыма на материковую часть Украины переехало 3991 из 13468 украинских военнослужащих.

Такие данные фигурируют в ответе Министерства обороны Украины на запрос народного депутата Украины Дмитрия Тымчука, передает " Крым.Реалии ".

"Сообщаем, что на 1 марта 2014 в воинских частях и учреждениях Вооруженных Сил Украины, дислоцированных на территории АР Крым, проходили службу 13 468 военнослужащих, из них: офицерского состава – 4637 человек, рядового, сержантского и старшинского состава – 8831 человек. К материковой части Украины прибыл 3991 военнослужащий, из них: офицерского состава – 1649 человек, рядового, сержантского и старшинского состава – 2342 человек", – говорится в документе.

thread.title_full: Teammitglieder für PServer - Page 1484

posts.author: apkdigital
posts.text:
Als was biete ich mich an?
- Vorzugsweise Board Administrator, notfalls kann ich Designs für Clients erstellen was aber eher nebensächlich ist. (Andere Backgrounds, neue Buttons etc.) Tiefstens Super-Moderator, ein normaler Moderator liegt unterhalb meiner Messlatte.
Wie alt bin ich?
- 18 Jahre jung, alt ist hier wohl fehl am Platz.
Was ich brauche?
- Ein erfahrenes Team mit einem Server der Online BLEIBT. Visionen und unrealistische Zukunftsträume sind mir lieber als trockener Oldschool ohne Spezialitäten... Eine WBB am besten bereits installiert. Version von 0xx - xx xx, komme mit allem zu Recht.
Stärken?
- Bei guter Laune, sehr motiviert mal richtig loszulegen und eine unverwechselbare Aussprache. (Sieht als BA etwas professioneller aus als hier jetzt. Hier gehts mir darum dich zu kriegen... äh...)
Aktivitätszeiten?
- Jeden Abend, jeden Morgen und eigentlich auch immer sonst. Unter der Woche mehr Zeit für genaue Bearbeitungen als am Wochenende.
Kontakt?
- Bitte hier. Wenn ich zusage oder ein persönliches Gespräch erwünscht ist, nutze ich TEAMSPEAK. KEIN SKYPE, NIEMALS!
Abschlusswort?
- Nein. Gross etwas zu sagen habe ich nicht weiter. Persönliches darf gerne Privat nachgefragt werden. Nein es wäre sicherlich nicht mein erstes Forum welches ich leite. Ingame erwarte ich eigentlich gar nichts, max. Level wäre schön aber brauch ich ebenfalls nicht. Das einzige was eventuell nett wäre, wäre ein [BA] vor dem Namen. Auch nicht zwingend notwendig.
Hoffe ich konnte mehr oder weniger jemandem imponieren. Ich stelle mein Board-Team i.d.R auch selbst zusammen aber gehe natürlich auf alles ein, was der Boss mir sagt.
King Regards

posts.author: Александр Пархоменко (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Аваков бросил Раду на 'растерзание': что происходит в центре Киева
posts.text:
Под Радой сегодня, 7 ноября, состоится масштабный митинг, участники которого, помимо прочего, будут требовать принять закон об импичменте президента.

Напомним, законопроект о президенте Украины и порядке прекращения его полномочий был зарегистрирован народным депутатом Юрием Деревянко. Импичментом признается парламентская конституционная процедура расследования и рассмотрения дела об устранении президента при наличии признаков государственной измены или иного преступления, передает politeka.net .

В настоящий момент под Радой раздаются листовки с призывом к митингующим заставить Раду принять соответствующий законопроект именно сегодня.

Примечательно, что несмотря на большое количество митингующих, полиции под Радой относительно немного. Если на минувших заседаниях парламента здание охраняли многочисленные кордоны силовиков, то сегодня полицейских значительно меньше.

posts.author: samneilson
posts.title: Research -Live Sound
posts.text:
Collaboration Rise Beyond (2015) Explains that the most important thing to remember when in a collaboration is communication, this is vital in this project as each person needs to know their role and know that each person has the same vision on how they want the final piece to sound. I feel this won’t be a major problem for Angel and myself as we are both honest individuals however we may also find this hard as we wouldn’t want to upset one and another and although we know how to face a problem with communication and voice our opinions so we shouldn’t let our friendship mix with our communicating as this could effect the tracks.
Rise Beyond (2015) Also states that to make a collaboration work you need to have authenticity this ensures that each person is being their self and allowing different personalities to bounce of each other, this way the piece becomes stronger as it can connect to a wider audience.
Reliability is also a key skill as I believe song writing can be quite a personal and emotional thing so you should be able to rely on your collaborator in this process. For this project I am working with a friend because of this I will not have to worry much about reliability as I know them well to be able to rely on them.
Compromise is also important for example, we have chosen a topic that both Angel and myself can relate too quite well which we done on purpose to make the writing process a lot easier, I also know that angel hasn’t written with anyone before which is something I am more familiar with as the majority of my tracks were created with Michael a friend I collaborated with last term, because of this we will make sure that we find the best way of writing possible that suits both of us. This is a compromise that we will both make.
I think its important to speak about everyone I am collaborating with in this project, My collaborators Include:
Angel is my main collaborator for this project she is a singer/ song writer from my class. We will be composing, recording and performing together, I feel I could learn a lot from Angel in the composing period as her song writing skills are a lot more developed than mine as it is something I struggle with most. Angel and I have different styles however we have learnt to merge these styles to create something very different to what we have both done before.
I will also be working with Jake another student from my class and we will be engineering ‘Space’ and ‘Little Girl’ he is also engineering Callum from our class. He usually records different style music which could have its pros and cons, He may be able to bring some unique ideas to the piece, however he may also be less confident recording a different style.
Teide a music student from first year will be playing guitar for us on ‘space’ and ‘Little Girl’ she is a singer/ songwriter and also plays very good guitar and takes influence from Ed Sheeran.
Fin another student from our class will also be recording the vocals for our 3rd song ‘Rewind’
I have asked Michael a friend of angel and myself and a also HE student, to give us his feedback on the two pieces. Will will also get Nick our tutor to do the same.
Working With A Friend Ive decided to research pros and cons of working with a friend and things to look out for. One key thing about working with a friend is that I can read there emotions well unlike if I was to work with a stranger, this gives us more space for communication and ensures that we are both on the same page especially when deciding how we’d like a certain song to sound.
Its also very easy to loose concentration in the writing process when working with a friend which is something we will look out for.
Performing When it comes to performing our songs Myself and Angel will make sure to use the knowledge that we have learnt from our research to carry out the best performance possible.
As part of the research we will be using will be from watching back past performances together and giving each other feedback on what went well and what could be improved. I will also be researching some of my favourite performers and watching at some of the skills they use to carry out a good performance which interacts with the audience.
Firstly I looked at one of my favourite artists Adele-
While watching this I wrote down all the facial expressions she made while singing I found the following-
Closed eyes Frowning Stays close to the mic, this creates a breathy sound which adds motion. Focuses eyes to certain audience members. She doesn’t have much stage movement and usually spends most of her songs sitting down or standing in one position this means she creates most of her audience interaction through her vocals and facial expressions, this is something id like to pick up.
I then watched back at my own recordings of Adele live at Wembley and noticed when it comes to her upbeat songs she’s very good at getting the audience going, she does this by pacing up and down the stage and pointing to specific audience members.
I have been watching a documentary on Popular vocals by ‘Gregory Porter’ in this he speaks about a huge range of iconic singers/ songwriters, this really opened my eyes to a lot of different styles of music and also showed me where some of my favourite styles have grown from.
To start of the documentary he speaks about Billie Holiday and her interaction with the audience through her spoken words, every word that she sings has meaning and emotion, she does this by entheszing each word and letting the music follow her. A good example of how she does this is in her song Strange Fruit.
Bibliography Rise Beyond (2015) 6 Skills Needed for an effective Collaboration , Rise Beyond:
College.Gregory Porter (2017) Popular Voices , Available at: https://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/b09g67l9/gregory-porters-popular-voices-series-1-2-crooners-co (Accessed: 24 Nov 2017).

thread.title: Teammitglieder für PServer - Page 1484
thread.title_full: Teammitglieder für PServer - Page 1484

posts.author: Filmerat
posts.text:
Hallo. Wir suchen noch einen Mini Techniker der zwischendurch und bei der Arbeit hilft da wir zeitlich kaum zeit haben, da wir mit System einbau / entwicklung zutun haben.
Was solltest du können:
Waffen / Rüstungen einfügen können
Protos erstellen können Client/Serverside
Questen
und eventuell Mappen ist aber kein muss
Erreichen kann man uns auf Skype: gbb.official
PS: Falls jemand eine eigene Homepage script + design erstellen kann suchen wir auch noch. Designer / Homepage Scripter
Einige Informationen zu unserem Konzept ( 85% Fertig):
Folgende Systeme haben wir eingebaut FunPvP)
Schulterband System
Titelsystem
Prestige System
Bonusboard
Shiningsystem
Offlineshop
Multilanguage
und vieles mehr.
Was ist Kazuma2 - Network:
Kazuma2 - Network ( wie im Name erwähnt ) ist ein Servernetzwerk aus 4 von sich ganz unterscheidenen Konzepten. Kazuma2 - Network
bietet einen FunPvP , einen Oldschool , einen Middleschool und einen Newschool Server. Der FunPvP, der zurerst startet ist der
am aufwändigsten (Zeit der bearbeitung) und der Newschool hat das Beste Konzept.
In Kazuma2 Startet man beim FunPvP Server mit dem Startlevel 130. Das maximale Level beträgt 140.
Leveln kann man durch das töten anderer Spieler. Man erhält durch das Töten sogenannte (PvP- Punkte) eine währung,
die man für 95 % des Servers braucht. Mit dem PvP Punkten kann man sich zum Beispiel Kostüme / Schulterbänder und weiteres kaufen,
was einen sehr wichtigen Elemente des Spiels sind.Als Beispiel sind uns Gilden sehr wichtig und sollten nicht einfach so
erstellt werden, deswegen braucht man auch zum Gilden erstellen eine gute menge an PvP - Punkten. Des weiteren haben wir auch einen
Vote und Itemshop wobei der Itemshop im Hintergrund besteht und eigentlich sogut wie garkeinen Spielvorteil bietet, da alles! durch die
PvP Punkte ermöglicht werden. Den itemshop benutzen wir lediglich zum erhalt des Servers ( da die ganze Infrastruktur relativ teuer ist)
Die Maps haben wir so gestaltet das es natürlich die Reichsmap sowie einige Standard Maps zum Kämpfen ausgerichtet sind.
Aber auch einige Spezielle Maps bietet wir. Durch eine PvP Wiese mit 10 Arenen kann man auch dort 3 gegen 3 Kämpfe bestreiten.
Als Events bieten wir nicht nur das klassische OX Event, sondern auch ein PvP Turnier.
Das Prestige System, eines der wichtigsten Elemente dieses Spiels ermöglicht einen sogenannten Aufstieg der Fähigkeiten.
Mit erreichen des maximalen Levels, hat man die möglich keit auf weitere Modifikationen (Bonis) die man durch jeden Aufstieg bekommt.
Aktuell gibt es 10 Stufen d.h. von Prestige 1 bis zum Prestige Master.
Natürlich wollen wir Alt und Neu ein wenig vermischen deswegen bieten wir vom klassischen Runenschwert und Teufelshornpanzer,
auch die möglichkeit von sogenannten Waffenkostümen und Shinings. Aktuell haben wir 20 verschiedene Shiningarten und es werden immer mehr.
Waffenkostüme haben wir auch alles Art da. 95% davon werden im PvP Shop verfügbar sein.
Schulterbänder die es auch im PvP Punkte Shop zu kaufen gibt kann man durch einige gewisse Items weiter verarbeiten ( PvP Punkteshop).
Natürlich wird es auch Verlosungen und auch andere Events wie zum Beispiel ein Weihnachtsevent und neue Updates für alle 4 Serverbereiche kommen.
Vorteile von Kazuma2- Network:
Wir bieten euch eine komplette Free2Play methode die es auch nach einigen wochen Spaß macht zu spielen und zeit in die Projekte zu investieren.
Da unsere Infrastruktur nicht nach 3-4 Wochen wie die meisten Privat Server down gehen wird, sind alle Server ein halbes Jahr vorrausgezahlt.
Wir bieten Features und weitere Updates für alle 4 Server und versuchen eine tolle Community zu schaffen. Natürlich werden auch Botter hacker oder
andere arten nicht toleriert und unserer Team was am ende aus ca . 40 Mann bestehen wird immer hard durchgreifen.
Zum erhalt dieser Infrastruktur brauchen wir natürlich auch geld. Aber wie in 90% der Privat Server sind wir keine Geld geier und
werden natürlich Preise human halten ( da aber das meiste mit sehr viel Zeit erreicht werden kann, ist der Itemshop nur zum erhalt des Servers).
Nachteile:
Aufgrund von der gesamten Infrastruktur solltet ihr regelmäßig Patchen da es sonst aufgrund von anderen Servern zu Problemen führen kann.
Ausfälle und Wartungsarbeiten können vermehrt vorkommen, sollten aber nicht der Hauptfaktor sein.
Abschluss:
Kazuma2 - Network begrüßt jeden spieler rechtherzlich und erwartet eine tolle und faire Community.
MFG
Das Kazuma2 - Network Team

posts.author: La Réunion positive
posts.title: Tourisme sportif : Les activités en pleine nature
posts.text: La Réunion Positive Tourisme sportif : Les activités en pleine nature La Région Réunion, à travers l’île de la Réunion Tourisme (IRT), oeuvre au quotidien afin de favoriser et de renforcer le tourisme sportif sur la destination. A la fois écoresponsable et bénéfique à tous les professionnels du secteur, ce type de tourisme, en plein essor à la Réunion, est un vecteur de croissance incontournable de l’industrie touristique dans sa globalité. Mardi 7 Novembre 2017 - 11:09 L’IRT, à travers sa direction "Ingénierie et Développement" oeuvre à l’aménagement et à l’entretien des infrastructures nécessaires à la pratique des activités sportives de pleine nature sur les différents sites. Cela inclus, entre autres, l’élagage et le nettoyage des sentiers de randonnées avec l’ONF et le Parc National. L’environnement exceptionnel dont bénéficie La Réunion pour la pratique de ces disciplines est mis en lumière au travers de campagnes de communication spécifiques, dans des supports ciblés traitant de l’actualité et délivrant des informations pertinentes sur le tourisme sportif de la destination. Des voyages de presse et blogtrips thématiques et spécialisés autour de nos filières prioritaires sont également organisés : Passion Rando, Wider, Subaqua et bien d’autres supports ont par exemple eu l’opportunité de mettre en avant notre île intense. Des guides informatifs sont diffusés auprès du grand public et des professionnels du tourisme à l’étranger afin de promouvoir les activités de pleine nature à La Réunion. De nombreux évènements phares, en lien avec la pratique de ces activités, permettent également de médiatiser la destination : le Grand Raid, la Mégavalanche, l’Ultra Run, le Festival de l’Image Sous-marine, le X-Terra, l’Open de Golf ou encore le Pandathlon sont des exemples. L’ensemble de ces actions permet d’accompagner les professionnels réunionnais du tourisme dans la valorisation de notre patrimoine naturel et la promotion de leurs prestations. Zoom sur : LES FILIÈRES PRIORITAIRES Pour l’Ile de La Réunion Tourisme, les filières prioritaires pour le développement du tourisme sportif à La Réunion sont : la randonnée – trail ; le parapente ; et le canyoning. D’autres filières ont également été identifiées comme porteuses, telles que le golf et le VTT. ÎLE DE LA RÉUNION TOURISME 4 rue Jules Thirel - Immeuble la balance - bat. B - 97460 Saint-Paul

thread.title: Peña Nieto, ¿símil de Echeverría?
thread.title_full: Peña Nieto, ¿símil de Echeverría?

posts.author: Javier Hernández (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Peña Nieto, ¿símil de Echeverría?
posts.text:
Por Javier Hernández 
La economía mexicana no daría un salto al pasado, si López Obrador fuera presidente en 2018, porque esa regresión se ha tenido con Enrique Peña Nieto (2012-2018). 
Luis Echeverría (1970-1976) recibió el país con un tipo de cambio de 12.50 por dólar estadunidense y lo entregó a José López Portillo (1976-1982), en 18.50 con algunas fluctuaciones. 
La administración de Peña Nieto, recibió de Felipe Calderón (2006-2012) un tipo de cambio parecido al de Echeverría Álvarez, de 12.97, teniendo como referencia la divisa de Estados Unidos y a un año de concluir su sexenio, el peso se ha depreciado a un promedio de 18.50. 
Asombra el parentesco entre las economías de Echevería y Peña Nieto, no sólo por el tipo de cambio, sino por otros detalles, como el desbocado endeudamiento de ambos. 
Y en el trayecto sexenal, partiendo del echeverrismo hasta llegar al peñanietismo, este ha sido el procesol devaluatorio de la moneda mexicana, según el economista Luis Pazos: 
" Con Luis Echeverría el peso se devaluó 94 por ciento ; en los seis años de López Portillo, 3,665 por ciento ; en los seis años de Miguel de la Madrid, 2,098 por ciento ; en los seis años de Salinas, 50 por ciento ; con Ernesto Zedillo, 133 por ciento ; en el gobierno de Vicente Fox, 15 por ciento ; en los seis años de Felipe Calderón, 21 por ciento ." 
Otras fuentes, entre ellas el Banco de México, señalan que la devaluación del peso, con Peña Nieto hasta 2017, ha sido de un 60 por ciento como promedio, con fluctuaciones en una banda del 55 al 65 por ciento, la peor en los últimos tres sexenios. 
Ya inmersos con EPN, en los vaivenes económicos del echeverrismo, ¿a qué época se refieren cuando vaticinan un salto al pasado con AMLO?

posts.title: Google tar oss ut i svenska skogarna med Scout View
posts.text:
Lars A Kommentarer: Google använder titt som tätt sin Street View-teknik för att ta oss till ensliga platser: Galápagosöarna, Petra, Mont Blanc och El Capitan är några exempel. Senaste fallet är svenska vandringsleder genom något Google kallar Scout View . Platserna som listas är Hackstabacken, Stålmyran, Ombergsleden, Nybo, Gammelstad och Hackstaskogen.
Det är förstås inte särskilt exotiskt för oss som bor i Sverige men de som vill kika kan besöka ScoutView.se . 
Uppdatering: Projektet är ett samarbete med scouterna i Sverige , vilket bör påpekas. Den svenska naturens experter = Scouterna. Följ med och upplev deras guldkorn ute i skogen på Google Street View: https://t.co/xisJhftuqP . pic.twitter.com/H7gffeXgTp 
— Google Sverige (@Google_Sverige) November 6, 2017 Senaste artiklarna om STREET VIEW

thread.title: Курганское УФАС уличило "Красное и белое" в дискриминации поставщиков.
thread.title_full: Курганское УФАС уличило "Красное и белое" в дискриминации поставщиков. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: Курганское УФАС уличило "Красное и белое" в дискриминации поставщиков.
posts.text: Курганское УФАС возбудило дело о нарушении торговой сетью "Красное и белое" антимонопольного законодательства в части установления дискриминации поставщиков товаров. Об этом сегодня сообщается на сайте антимонопольного ведомства.В октябре 2017 года УФАС и прокуратура области провели внеплановые проверки деятельности ряда торговых сетей на предмет соблюдения требований Федерального закона "Об основах государственного регулирования торговой деятельности в Российской Федерации". В работе сети "Красное и белое" обнаружились нарушения.По мнению антимонопольного ведомства, "Красное и белое" устанавливает различные требования к исполнению аналогичных обязательств для поставщиков в торговую сеть, в частности, неправомерно устанавливает различные размеры ответственности за ненадлежащее исполнение идентичных обязательств поставщиками товаров. Поставщики поставлены в неравное положение по сравнению со своими конкурентами, имеющими более выгодные условия поставок товаров. Такие действия торговой сети могут свидетельствовать о фактах дискриминации поставщиков.

thread.title: Am I insane?
thread.title_full: Am I insane? - BabyCenter

posts.author: TaylorrStarr
posts.title: Am I insane?
posts.text: So my husband doesn't want to TTC (trying to conceive) right now, but even though I KNOW this, I still am hopeful. Wtf is wrong with me? Like I'm hopeful each month that MAYBE just MAYBE it'll happen anyways (pullout method) but then of course it doesn't happen. Well this last month he accidentally came in me the day AFTER I ovulated. I took a plan B because he wanted me to and it sucked, but yet here I am thinking "well maybe it didn't work". I'm either sad about it, or I'm unreasonably hopeful that maybe it'll happen anyways. How do you just put this dream on hold and let go? it consumes my thoughts.

thread.title: Google arbetar på filhanterare för Android – Files Go
thread.title_full: Google arbetar på filhanterare för Android – Files Go

posts.author: Lars A
posts.title: Google arbetar på filhanterare för Android – Files Go
posts.text:
Nämen, detta har jag väntat på sedan htc magic. Att det inte funnits som en del av grundutbudet av google appar är bortom mig. Fred . 
Android har ju redan en filhanterare, den heter ”Downloads”. Anders Olsson 
Bra att Google kommer med en filrensare behövs verkligen, CCleaner slutade ju att fungera, nu kör jag med sd maid pro men behövs ju verkligen en officiell filrensare för android. DmBzls 
Den erbjuder ju inga smarta funktioner direkt. Jämför med ”solid Explorer”, där har du en riktigt bra filhanterare! DmBzls 
Solid Explorer 💝 Fred . 
Nja, kanske inte. Men den kanske har tillräckligt med funktioner för dom flesta för att göra grundläggande saker som behövs. Philip Carlsson 
Någon annan som har testat och har ”problem” med att den visar appar man använder dagligen som oanvända sedan x månader tillbaka? 
(Ja, jag är högst medveten om att det inte är en färdig produkt.) corb06 
Har haft Solid Explorer sen tidernas början men övergick helt till annan filhanterar som jag verkligen gillar. File Manager+ 4,7 i rating.

posts.author: Lars A
posts.title: Google Pixel 2 och 2 XL får skärmläge som ökar färgmättnaden
posts.text:
http://www.ne.se/uppslagsverk/encyklopedi/l%C3%A5ng/m%C3%A4ttad-f%C3%A4rg Fredrik Dahlberg 
Hahahahaha, touché. Viss skillnad på att göra ett misstag, och den rådande IGNORANS som breder ut sig i det svenska skrivna språket idag. Du vet mycket jävla väl vad jag menar. 
Men 1-0 till dig. Tiny Turtle 
Klart jag förstod vad du menade. Precis som att du mycket väl förstod vad BMbuster ville säga men ändå var tvungen att låtsas att det var oförståeligt och påpeka det – och nu slå fast att han gjorde det av ”ignorans” medan du skrev motsatsen till vad du menade ”av misstag”. Dubbla måttstockar much? Fredrik Dahlberg 
Nej, jag förstod inte vad han menade. Därav min fråga. Ja, den utbredda ignoransen är stor, det vet du. Jag erkänner mitt fel, men varför är det ett sånt jävla gnäll på när man påpekar något konstigt som man inte förstår, eller något uppenbart galet. Förklara gärna det. Normaliseringen av alla fel överallt, är skrämmande. jkob 
Yeah. Testade sRGB och tog några timmar men sen kändes det rätt normalt och behagligt mot ögonen. Tiny Turtle 
Tack för att du förklarar för mig vad jag vet – det hjälper verkligen. 
Det är inte ett jävla gnäll när man (dvs du) påpekar något konstigt eller uppenbart galet. Det blev en kommentar du garvade åt när du själv gjort ett misstag. Tycker du verkligen min kommentar var ”ett jävla gnäll”? 
BMbusters slarvfel var litet. Jag har inga som helst problem att förstå vad han menar. Kanske att ”likväl” är en mellanting av vad han skrev och vad du föreslog? 
Ditt rasande över tingens förfall tänker jag inte blanda mig i. Fredrik Dahlberg 
Din kommentar var inte ett jävla gnäll, pratar inte om dig specifikt. Det är ju dock så, att varje gång man påpekar något som är tokigt, så ska det alltid bemötas med att någon ska kalla en för ordpolis osv. Jag förstod inte vad han ville säga, och om jag uttryckte det fel, så ursäkta mig. La till en smiley, för att inte lägga för mycket allvar i det. 
”Skärmen är tråkig” = åsikt 
De två ska ej blandas, IMO. 
Nog om detta nu. 😉 
Typ som Samsung hade på Galaxy SII för snart åtta år sedan? Ja, det var en bra idé av Google att uppfinna det nu. zzcool

posts.text:
Chị Dâu Tôi - Truyện Ngắn Đêm Khuya Hay Nhất thiên bình 
giữ vững lập trường trong mọi tình huống khó khăn. Nó chỉ thực sự bộc phát sự tức hay ưa nịnh, thích được người khác khen ngợi, tán tỉnh và thích những món quà bất nói những lời dối trá để lừa gạt đối phương. Họ luôn hướng về thực tại, không lãng một loài vật tương đối lành. Nó sẽ không ngáng đường, hãm hại, cản trở bất kì ai và yêu thì sẽ yêu hết mình, cho đi mà không cần nhận lại. Họ thường có xu hướng chọn muốn chọc tức những người thuộc cung này thì bạn nên dừng lại kẻo đến một ngày nào nên quá nóng vội, hấp tấp. Bạn cũng không nên chủ động bày tỏ tình cảm của mình đó, khi sức chịu đựng của họ đi quá giới hạn, họ sẽ sử dụng đến sức mạnh bạo lực. là được người mình yêu chăm sóc, che chở, bảo vệ đến suốt đời. Họ luôn tìm kiếm cho mình một người tâm đầu ý hợp mà không cần quan tâm đến bề ngoài, tuổi tác. Đối với gia đình mình, Kim Ngưu mong muốn cùng người bạn đời của mình xây dựng nên một mái thẳng mệt mỏi. Trong bữa ăn, Kim Ngưu thể hiện sự quan tâm của mình đối với mọi 
tivi internet tiện cho việc ra các sản phẩm âm nhạc hơn".2 cô gái xinh đẹp, hát hay và quyết định của hai cô gái này.Được biết, nghệ danh Kily được hai cô gái Huỳnh Thị Kim Hoàng con đường mà hai đứa đã chọn""Theo đuổi đam mê – thành công sẽ theo đuổi bạn"Mặc dù đôi thứ thiệt.Hiện tại, ngoài cover nhạc trên mạng thì Kim Hoàng và Hoàng Ly đã có tính cũng hợp cạ.Bản thân hai đứa mình cũng luôn mong muốn có một người bạn cùng chung trẻ.2 cô gái xinh đẹp, hát hay và quyết định táo bạo bị gia đình phản đối - Ảnh còn rất trẻ tuổi và mới chập chững bước vào làng âm nhạc, nhưng đôi bạn này đã dần táo bạo bị gia đình phản đối - Ảnh 7.Không chỉ làm việc cùng nhau, cặp đôi này còn lập nên trong thời gian tới nếu có điều kiện, hai đứa dự định sẽ "về chung một nhà" để cover những ca khúc đình đám một thời của Kim Hoàng và Hoàng Ly được nhiều người yêu bạn của hai người, Hoàng Ly tâm sự: "Tụi mình chơi với nhau được một thời gian chưa biết chơi các loại nhạc cụ cùng với ngoại hình xinh xắn, dễ thương, đôi bạn này quyết 
Cách làm sạch gan và bảo vệ gan luôn khỏe mạnh đơn giản ngay tại nhà mất rồi. *** Linh Chi ngồi im...Tình tay baTình tay baGia đình, bạn bè chỉ biết vợ mạnh...Minh chia tay anh nhéMinh chia tay anh nhé- Mình chia tay thôi anh – cô lên anh" – nhìn cái bánh kem nhỏ có đề ngày 18 tháng 3, em nhớ anh lắm, cảm giác da diết hai người...Nơi có hoa dã quỳNơi có hoa dã quỳTình yêu của họ bắt đầu từ những cánh dùng...Khi người ta trẻ 2Khi người ta trẻ 2(Lấy cảm hứng từ "Khi người ta trẻ" của đến nao lòng anh à... *** Đời sinh viên của em gắn liền với từng...Đôi bờ hạnh Phan Thị Vàng Anh) Bố bảo sẽ phải đưa tôi đi giám định tâm lý, điều trị tâm thần, tao xác định hắn là một tên Badboy chính hiệu, và từ đầu người hắn có ý định tán tỉnh chồng Hải Tú ly thân, Tú bỏ việc về quê mà không rõ lý do thực. Nhiều người hòa giải thương, đủ để tiến tới hôn...Yêu mãi đến kiếp sauYêu mãi đến kiếp sau"Mừng sinh nhật Đêm nào đấy của tháng mười một năm trước, trời mùa đông thật lạnh, bên ngoài chỉ đồng hoa dã quỳ ở nông trường trên cao nguyên Mộc Châu xinh đẹp. thread.title: Complaints plan for sexual misconduct will open within a month, Corbyn confirms
thread.title_full: Complaints plan for sexual misconduct will open within a month, Corbyn confirms

posts.author: Peter Edwards
posts.title: Complaints plan for sexual misconduct will open within a month, Corbyn confirms
posts.text:
Bex Bailey Harassment Jeremy Corbyn Labour Labour leadership Labour Party Scotland sexual misconduct Theresa May Tories 
Jeremy Corbyn and Theresa May have agreed new measures to report sexual misconduct, including a role for trade unions, which will be introduced by the end of the month. 
The Labour leader condemned harassment and bullying again yesterday as he said the meeting of party leaders had ended with plans for a new grievance procedure for staff to confidentially report claims of sexual impropriety. 
Corbyn, who had earlier told the CBI conference that business and unions could work together in “rooting out” sexual harassment and discrimination , spoke to cameras last night following emergency talks in May’s Commons office prompted by a week of appalling allegations, including one by former official Bex Bailey that she had been raped at a party event and discouraged from pursuing her complaint . 
“Any form of harassment or bullying is completely unacceptable in this workplace or indeed any other workplace in the country,” Corbyn said in the Commons. 
“We have agreed we will establish in one month a group of representatives of the parties and of their staff via the trade unions in this building who will work out necessary procedures – a way for people who are suffering bulling or sexual harassment being able to report it in the confidence it will be kept private – if that is what they want – but that it will also be referred to appropriate agencies for advice and if necessary action by the police if there is obviously a serious and violent action involved.” 
May, who faced criticism yesterday from her own ministers that she had not yet “gripped” the scandal, said the meeting paved the way for tougher action. 
“I think if this hasn’t happened to you it’s difficult to appreciate the impact that being a victim of this sort of behaviour can have, it simply has a lasting impact on people,” she said, in comments reported by the BBC. 
“We need to do more to stop these abuses of power and I’m pleased that having convened this meeting of party leaders today we have agreed a way forward.” 
We need zero tolerance of sexual harassment – Corbyn letter to May before talks   To report anything from the comment section, please e-mail [email protected]

thread.title: Das Floß: Unsichere Reise: Ostende-Triennale mit Jan Fabre
thread.title_full: Das Floß: Unsichere Reise: Ostende-Triennale mit Jan Fabre

posts.title: Das Floß: Unsichere Reise: Ostende-Triennale mit Jan Fabre
posts.text: Angriff Kirchen-Attentäter war wütend auf Schwiegermutter Facebook Ostende Jan Fabre hat die Kunsttriennale in Ostende unter das Thema des Floßes gestellt. Mehr als 70 internationale Künstler haben dazu Werke geschaffen, die ästhetisch beeindruckend und inhaltlich beklemmend sind. Inhalt   Unsichere Reise: Ostende-Triennale mit Jan Fabre Blutrote Wollfäden, in denen Boote wie Insekten in Spinnnetzen gefangen sind. Der Titel der Rieseninstallation: "Uncertain Journey", Unsichere Reise. Das raumgreifende Werk der in Berlin lebenden japanischen Künstlerin Chiharu Shiota fasziniert durch seine visuelle Ästhetik, wirkt aber beklemmend durch seine Botschaft. In der Arbeit geht es um Flüchtende auf dem Mittelmeer und um Fragen der Existenz. Das Werk ist zurzeit in Ostende im Museum für Schöne Künste zu sehen. Shiota ist mit mehr als 70 Künstlern, darunter Luc Tuymans, Marina Abramovic, Michaël Borremans und Berlinde de Bruyckere, der Einladung des belgischen Starkünstlers Jan Fabre und der Kunsthistorikern Joanna Devos gefolgt, an der Triennale der belgischen Hafenstadt teilzunehmen. Der Titel "Das Floß. Kunst ist (nicht) einsam" lehnt sich an ein Werk von Fabre an. Im Mittelpunkt des bis zum 15. April dauernden Kunstevents an der belgischen Küste steht das Motiv des Floßes. Dabei werden die Werke an ungewöhnlichen Orten ausgestellt wie in den Reitställen der bekannten Rennbahn des Seebads und im 20. Stockwerk des höchsten Gebäudes der Stadt. Die visuellen Interpretationen der Thematik reichen von Selbstporträts auf einem Floß, mit denen Katie O’Hagan und Fabien Mérelle Wehrlosigkeit und Orientierungslosigkeit illustrieren, bis hin zu Fossilien, Ausdruck für unbewegliche und verkrustete Strukturen angesichts von Notstand und Elend. Zu den ästhetisch spektakulärsten Arbeiten gehört das Boot von Michael Fliri. Es besteht aus rund 5 000 weißen Plastikflaschen. Vor zehn Jahren schon entwarf der in Südtirol geborene Künstler in Prato in der Toskana eine Version des Bootes. Damals habe die Arbeit seine Sehnsucht nach dem Meer zum Ausdruck gebracht, wie Fliri sagte. Die Flüchtlingskrise und das Problem des Plastikmülls verleihen heute seinem Werk jedoch eine ganz andere Bedeutung. Berlinde de Bruyckere hat zusammen mit Mirjam Devriendt ein Video geschaffen, das die Arbeit in einer Gerberei zeigt und die Frage von Leben und Tod in den Raum stellt. Mit einem Floß aus Bronze-Salzstangen spielt der Österreicher Manfred Erjautz auf die Moral unserer Konsumgesellschaft an. Seine in Miniatur-Form verpackte Botschaft: Bei Bier und Salzgebäck werden heute vor dem Fernseher die größten Dramen konsumiert. Schiffbruch, Rettung, Ort der Einsamkeit, Angst, Verzweiflung und des Überlebenskampfes: Das Motiv des Floßes hat im 18. und 19. Jahrhundert zahlreiche Künstler inspiriert. Mit "Das Floß der Medusa" wurde Théodore Géricault (1791-1824) berühmt. Das Gemälde bezieht sich auf den Schiffbruch der französischen Fregatte Medusa im Jahr 1816. Der Kapitän hatte rund 150 Menschen ohne Proviant und Wasser auf einem Floß ausgesetzt. Nur 15 überlebten, die anderen starben an Hunger und Durst und fielen Kannibalismus zum Opfer. Aus dem von Géricault dargestellten Drama hat 1986 auch Fabre seine Inspiration geschöpft. Unter dem Titel "Kunst ist (nicht) einsam" hat der heute 58-jährige Künstler ein Floß entworfen, auf dem sich ein kleines Fußballfeld und eine Sporthalle befinden. Damit verweist er auf den für die Kreativität notwendigen Rückzug des Künstlers, aber auch auf das Bedürfnis nach Kontakt und Kommunikation. Diese Dualität kommt bei Fabre vor allem in seiner Performance-Kunst zum Ausdruck, die auf Austausch mit dem Publikum beruht. "Wir sind in unserem Kampf für soziales Engagement nicht alleine", erklärte er. "Wir stehen nicht über der Gesellschaft, sondern arbeiten mit ihr." Die erste Triennale fand vor drei Jahren statt. Sie wurde von dem belgischen Kunsthistoriker Jan Hoet konzipiert, dem künstlerischen Leiter der Documenta IX von 1992 in Kassel. Hoet starb im Februar 2014 noch vor der Eröffnung der Triennale. Fabre war ihm befreundet gewesen. "Die diesjährige Triennale ist auch eine Hommage an Hoet", betont Fabre.

thread.section_title: Prostate Problems. Forum discussing Prostate Problems at Patient | Patient
thread.title: Catheterization
thread.title_full: Catheterization | Prostate Problems | Patient

posts.author: oldbuzzard
posts.text:
No, its not normal. but there are a lot of possible reasons. How large was your prostate? The bigger ones take longer to heal and to get results. Its also possible that the major part of your problem is bladder related and that can encompass two different things. 1) Your bladder wasn't/isn't functioning. 2) The procedure shocked it and sort of locked it up. That happened to me and my doc prescribed Myrbetriq to calm my bladder down. It worked, I stopped taking it and all is well.
Did they do a urodynamics test on you before doing Rezum? Also, I found that peeing came back slowly - at first just a few dribbles, then a short stream, ect. Are you able to void naturally at all prior to self cathing? IMO, you should be evaluated prior to mid December and more effort should be made to figure out why you aren't recovering. One thing they could do is try a temporary stent - even for a few minutes. If that allows you to pee, you can be reasonably assured that eventually, the swelling will go down and you'll be OK. If not, then your prostate isn't the main cause of your problem. The good news is if your bladder is the issue, the best hope for recovery is self cathing. Hank1953 and jimjames have both had significant improvement from self cathing.

posts.title: Quốc phục xuyên thấu gợi cảm của Thùy Dung tại HH Quốc tế
posts.text:
Quốc phục xuyên thấu gợi cảm của Thùy Dung tại HH Quốc tế Anh Đào Thứ Ba, ngày 07/11/2017 15:52 PM (GMT+7) (Dân Việt) Á hậu Thùy Dung mang hình ảnh con cò của nông thôn Việt Nam đến Miss Intetnational 2017. Màn diễn bikini "nảy lửa" của top 45 Hoa hậu Hoàn vũ Việt Nam Trang phục truyền thống của Thùy Dung mang đậm bản sắc làng quê với con cò, luỹ tre làng 
Trang phục truyền thống vẫn là một trong những phần thi quan trọng tại Hoa hậu Quốc tế 2017. Để chuẩn bị cho bộ trang phục đặc biệt này, Thùy Dung đã làm việc với NTK Tín Thái để lên ý tưởng và thực hiện từ tháng 6.2017. Sau quá trình nghiên cứu và hoàn tất, á hậu và NTK chính thức ra mắt trang phục dân tộc mang tên "Tiên Dung". 
Lấy cảm hứng từ tà áo dài truyền thống của dân tộc, bộ trang phục mang đến hình ảnh quen thuộc trong tâm thức người Việt – con cò. Biết bao đời nay, con cò gắn bó với người Việt từ thuở ấu thơ, qua lời ầu ơ mẹ ru đến khi lớn lên nối nghiệp nhà nông. Con cò cũng là hình ảnh biểu tượng qua những câu ca dao, tục ngữ, thơ ca của quê hương nước Việt từ ngàn xưa. Cánh cò đậu trên luỹ tre làng - đó là hình tượng mang ý nghĩa cho đời sống nông thôn và con người Việt Nam. Thùy Dung hoá thân thành nàng tiên mang ước vọng phát triển của đất nước Việt Nam 
Bộ trang phục mang màu trắng chủ đạo, với 6 tà tượng trưng cho tư tưởng lục long, lục thân. Chất liệu tơ sống dệt thủ công của miền Bắc mang lại cảm giác nhẹ nhàng như cánh cò. Bên cạnh đó, hình ảnh lá tre và đôi cò được thêu kết thủ công với hàng ngàn hạt pha lê và cườm thuỷ tinh. Sự sinh sôi, nảy nở và trường tồn thể hiện qua đôi cò trên thân áo. 
Chiếc mấn là hình ảnh con cò đang ấp trứng trên bụi tre cách điệu tạo thành 5 vòng, tượng trưng cho Ngũ Hành của Trời Đất (Kim-Mộc-Thuỷ-Hoả-Thổ), Ngũ Đức của người quân tử (Nhân-Lễ-Nghĩa-Trí-Tín) và Ngũ Phúc (Phú-Quý-Thọ-Khang-Ninh), ngụ ý về truyền thống tôn thờ Trời Đất, về đạo thờ Mẫu của người Việt xưa, về sự tôn kính đức quân tử phu quân và về trách nhiệm chu toàn cuộc sống gia đình của người phụ nữ Việt Nam. Mấn được chế tác bằng kim loại, tạo hình, gò hàn tỉ mỉ, từng chi tiết đều được khắc đục bằng tay, mô phỏng gần nhất với hình ảnh cây tre Việt Nam. Tổng thể bộ quốc phục mà Thùy Dung mang đi thi đấu quốc tế 
Bộ quốc phục mang mong muốn truyền tải thông điệp về nữ quyền, tình hữu nghị, khát khao vươn xa và phát triển của đất nước Việt Nam, được hòa nhập và song hành với bước đi thế giới. Chia sẻ về ý tưởng thực hiện bộ trang phục, NTK Tín Thái nói: "Tôi nhớ ra hình ảnh con cò luôn gắn liền với người xưa lẫn nay, trong tâm thức từ bé đã thuộc lòng câu hát - con cò bé bé, nó đậu cành tre... Từ đó, tôi phát triển ý tưởng thành một trang phục, đủ sáng tạo mà vẫn đáp ứng tính truyền thống và nhận diện quốc gia". 
Bộ trang phục được thực hiện thủ công suốt 3 tháng qua và vận chuyển đặc biệt trong 3 kiện hàng để sang Nhật Bản cùng Á hậu Thùy Dung. Trong đêm chung kết diễn ra vào ngày 14.11, Thùy Dung sẽ trình diễn thiết kế "Tiên Dung" này trên sân khấu cuộc thi Miss International.

thread.title: "Пятерочка" и "Магнит" — видят ли покупатели разницу.
thread.title_full: "Пятерочка" и "Магнит" — видят ли покупатели разницу. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: "Пятерочка" и "Магнит" — видят ли покупатели разницу.
posts.text:
Компания Gfk провела исследование российского рынка, на котором сейчас борются две крупнейшие российские сети.
"На „Пятерочку" и „Магнит" приходится 2/3 оборота канал дискаунтеров и около 30% всего оборота современной торговли", — рассказал руководитель направления Shopper Insights компании GFK Алексей Горбатенко в ходе форуме Trade Marketing Forum 2018.
Исследование проводилось на основе панели домашних хозяйств, которой пользуется компания Gfk. Это десять тысяч человек, которые постоянно сканируют свои покупки. И выяснилось — большинство покупателей ходят в магазины обеих сетей. Связано это с их широким присутствием практически во всех регионах России. Суммарно у "Магнита" и "Пятерочки" — порядка 25 тысяч торговых точек по всей стране. И нередко они расположены, что называется, "дверь в дверь", то есть в одном дворе или даже в одном доме. И даже индекс NPS — вероятности рекомендации — у них похож и, в общем-то, одинаково низок — всего 1–2%. Говоря языком честным, покупать люди не любят ни там, ни там, но при этом все равно покупают. И разницу между похожими даже цветом логотипов магазинами видят.
Так, например, "Магнит" привлекает повседневной дешевой корзиной. По мнению большинства, даже без промо-акций закупиться там можно весьма бюджетно. Кроме того, там часто бывают акции с интересными и необычными подарками. У "Пятерочки" есть свои фанаты за её стратегию скидок. Это единственный крупный дискаунтер, который запустил в стране полноформатную систему лояльности.
Что касается удобства — то "Магнит" ценят за скорость совершения покупок, отсутствие очередей, ну и удобное расположение магазинов. Все-таки в стране их на пару тысяч больше, чем у конкурента. Про "Пятерочку" говорят, что там легко ориентироваться и почти никогда не случается такого, что какой-то товар отсутствует. Если говорить о самих товарах, то в "Магнит" идут за товарами повседневного спроса и продуктами, которые производятся в местном регионе. А в "Пятерочке" чаще берут выгодные СТМ, товары зарубежного производства — которых у конкурента, кстати, нет, а также фрукты и овощи.
Напомним, в октябре появились сообщения о том, что за третий квартал сеть "Пятерочка" установилаочередной рекорд, добавив 301,7 тысяч кв. м торговой площади.

thread.title: Army boyfriend -
thread.title_full: Army boyfriend - The Student Room

posts.author: meganxoxc
posts.title: Army boyfriend -
posts.text:
Army boyfriend
 Hey, I'm in a really difficult situation. My boyfriend after 7 months is going in the army this January coming. I've known from the beginning he's wanted to do this and I've never understood how it all works. He's given me different stories and he's hidden a lot of the facts about it. We have been arguing for weeks on end and then we are okay because of him going to the army and he doesn't think I will be able to cope. I'm only young and want to enjoy my life and don't want to be left at home waiting feeling horrible but is that how I will feel? I do feel like I love him but sometimes it might not be enough ;( he seems to put an image across that going in the army is really easy. He says he will go out with the "lads" to the pub every night but I don't understand how you can do that when you are in the army? Please can someone talk to me through it at least give me an idea of how the process works
